143.description: Whether your app is mobile, web, or cloud native, Google Cloud Platform (GCP) has an entire suite of serverless tools that can help. What is serverless? It means cloud power available instantly and transparently, without having to create any virtual machines or manage scaling or application runtimes. See how GCP and serverless can make your app's backend more powerful, cheaper, and easier to build and manage. We'll explore compute products like Google Cloud Functions, big data tools, like Firestore and BigQuery, and machine learning tools that can connect to build entire systems (web, mobile, and cloud) that run purely serverless!
143.title: Building serverless applications with Google Cloud

144.description: Mikroservislerin son yƒ±llardaki pop√ºlerliƒüi ve monolitik korku d√∂ng√ºs√º, yazƒ±lƒ±m alanƒ±ndaki uzmanlarƒ±n bir uygulama geli≈ütirmeye ba≈ülarken direkt mikroservis mimarisi kurmaya √ßalƒ±≈ümasƒ±na neden olmaktadƒ±r. Oysa ba≈ülangƒ±√ß olarak monolitik bir uygulama ile ba≈ülamak ve sonrasƒ±nda doƒüru zamanda 'domain driven design' prensipleri ile mikroservisleri modellemek ve mimariyi kurgulamak t√ºrl√º ba≈üarƒ±sƒ±zlƒ±k senaryolarƒ±nƒ± engellemekte anahtar noktadƒ±r. Bu konu≈ümada, monolitik bir uygulamanƒ±n mikroservis mimarisine ge√ßi≈üini anlatƒ±rken; mikroservislerin artƒ±larƒ± ve eksilerine, doƒüru ekip/zaman parametresine, mimari ve tasarƒ±m a≈üamasƒ±nda dikkate alƒ±nmasƒ± gereken kavramlara, mimari seviyedeki tasarƒ±m desenlerine deƒüinmeyi ve bu yolculukta iyzico olarak neler √∂ƒürendiƒüimizi anlatmayƒ± hedefliyorum.
144.title: From monolith to microservices and beyond

146.description: Makine √ñƒürenmesi Yapay Zeka ve Derin √ñƒürenme hakkƒ±nda basit kar≈üƒ±la≈ütƒ±rmalar ve i≈üleyi≈üi.
146.title: AI vs Machine Learning Vs Deep Learning

147.description: Kotlin Java ile birlikte calisabilse de Mockito Kotlin dilinin t√ºm mocklama ihtiya√ßlarƒ±nƒ± kar≈üƒ±lamƒ±yor. Kotlin'de en √ßok kullanƒ±lan mocklama k√ºt√ºphanesi olan MockK'den bahsedeceƒüim.
147.title: Kotlin'de mocklama ve MockK

148.description: Google Asistan'ƒ±n yapabilecekleri ve geleceƒüi ile ilgili kƒ±sa bir giri≈ü yaptƒ±ktan sonra  Asistan'a √∂zellik ekleme veya uygulama geli≈ütirme olarak da isimlendirilebilecek Action geli≈ütirme konusunu, √∂rnek projeler √ºzerinde anlatacaƒüƒ±m.  √ñzellikle Firebase Cloud Functions ve Dialogflow kullanarak kendi web servislerini sesli bir aray√ºze a√ßarak kullanƒ±cƒ±larƒ±na daha iyi bir deneyim sunmak isteyen geli≈ütiriciler i√ßin uygulama ve action geli≈ütirirken hangi a√ßƒ±lardan farklƒ± d√º≈ü√ºnmek gerekir gibi sorularƒ± yanƒ±tlayacaƒüƒ±m. Google Asistan'a Action geli≈ütirmenin artƒ± ve eksi y√∂nlerinden bahsedip, Action publish edenlerin kabul edildiƒüi Actions On Google Community Program ile ilgili bilgi vereceƒüim.
148.title: Building Actions For The Google Assistant

150.description: Progressive Web Applications or PWAs in short, utilize modern Web Technologies to create cross-platform applications that offer the best of web and native user experiences. This talk begins with the introduction of the PWAs, advantages over the legacy approaches and covers the core elements that define a PWA accompanied by examples with popular libraries like Angular, React and Vue.
150.title: A DEEP DIVE INTO PROGRESSIVE WEB APPS

151.description: Sunumda √∂ncesinde  Arduino Lilypad ve Raspberry Pi Zero'dan kƒ±saca bahsedip ardƒ±ndan onlarla yapƒ±lmƒ±≈ü √∂rnek projelere yer vereceƒüim. Ardƒ±ndan kendi projelerimi anlatacaƒüƒ±m. Devamƒ±nda 'Giyilebilir Teknolojide Kadƒ±n Hareketinden' kƒ±saca bahsedip ilgi duyanlar i√ßin ba≈ülangƒ±√ß projeleriyle ilgili √∂rnek linkler/projeler/etkinlikler g√∂stererek sunumumu bitireceƒüim.
151.title: Arduino ile E-Textiles & Giyilebilir Teknoloji Projeleri

152.description: Swift programlama dilindeki Enumeration'larƒ±n g√º√ßl√º √∂zellikleri ve bunlarƒ±n g√ºnl√ºk hayattaki kullanƒ±m √∂rneklerinden bahsedeceƒüim.
152.title: Powerful Enums in Swift

153.description: Bir Android uygulamasi gelistirmeye baslarken verilmesi gereken kritik kararlar vardir? Kotlin mi kullansak Java mi? Test yazalim mi yoksa Google Play'e direk atalim, sonra bir ara mi yazalim? Data binding mi? Cok gerek yok sanki(!)... ve daha fazlasi icin bakalim dogru karari verebilecek misin?
153.title: Interactive Android Application

154.description: Technological improvement totally depends on internet infrastructure of a country Turkey's widespread fiber investments are enough to jump in a developed countrys' scale or we need to look in a different way? Connectivity-aided economic growth offers greater possibilities and prosperity for all sectors of society. If all stakeholders work together on evidence-based strategies to achieve it, while minimizing disruption, Turkey can hasten a highly connected future that benefits everyone So, we need to speak connectivity first rather than popular topics like AI, IoT or Cloud because fiber or mobile investments supports or creastes those Technologies first My session will bring a different angle to participants' mind and for country's sake they will think what we have to do or request in near future
154.title: Turkey's Internet Capabilities though Technology

155.description: In this talk, I'll talk about basic concepts of Angular and get down to business immediately! We'll go through couple steps. First, we'll create an Angular app using Angular CLI. Then, we'll create our modules, components, services. Finally, we'll use Angular Firebase to glue everything together. Once our app is ready, we'll build it and deploy it to Firebase Hosting to test it together live!
155.title: Building realtime messaging app with Angular and Firebase

156.description: As a Scrum Master and a Product Owner, we want share our stories about how we applied Scrum during a Mobile Application Project which is now available on Apple and Google Play Stores.  We will also talk about our personal journey of turning our career paths towards Agile.
156.title: Scrum Fighters: Adventures of a Scrum Team on a Mobile Application Project

157.description: Is 'industrial software' any different than usual software? Do ‚ÄúIoT solutions‚Äù really solve anything? How to deal with the ridiculously complex problems that come with IoT and industry 4.0 (or industry *.*)? How to survive in all this chaos as a software architect?
157.title: IoT, Industrial Software and Survival Guide of a Software Architect

158.description: In the technology sector, we are all going through similar paths. We make mistakes, we learn, we try, we make mistakes again.. In this session, I will talk about what should be done for a better career journey. I will also share the work I do with the Jedi Masters of the sector. Who wouldn't want to learn advice and tactics to be a better developer? Even if you are a senior developer..
158.title: How to be a Jedi Master: Journey from Padawan to Master

159.description: I am 12 years old for four years now I have been coding and building robots.This year I built a guide dog robot for visually impaired people, my robot dog iC4U and I won the first prize in the hardware category at Coderdojo's International Coolest Projects 2018 and we were also one of the 5 finalists in the open innovation category of the European Youth Awards 2018. I am now working on the second version of my robot guide dog that has AI features such as image processing and voice control. Whilst doing this I am learning python, tensor flow and how to use google AIY kits. I am also in the process of building a new robot for 2019 robotic competitions.
159.title: #ibuildrobots - My journey of building robots

160.description: Well-designed animations makes a UI feel more intuitive, contribute to the slick look and feel of a polished app, and improve the user experience. Flutter‚Äôs animation support makes it easy to implement a variety of animation types. Many widgets, especially Material widgets, come with the standard motion effects defined in their design spec, but it‚Äôs also possible to customize these effects. On my presentation, I will talk about animation types and how we can implement this animations with code examples.
160.title: Animations On Flutter

161.description: Artƒ±k karar mekanizmalarƒ±nƒ±n bir kƒ±smƒ±nƒ±n bile teknolojiye devredildiƒüi dijital √ßaƒüda , ≈üirket organizasyon yapƒ±larƒ±, i≈ü yapƒ±≈ü ≈üekilleri , √ßalƒ±≈üan profilleri ve motivasyonlarƒ± ba≈ütan a≈üaƒüƒ± deƒüi≈üti. D√º≈ü√ºn√ºlenin aksine , insana olan ihtiyacƒ±n azalmayƒ±p arttƒ±ƒüƒ±,  duygusal zekanƒ±n analitik zeka ile aynƒ± hatta bazen √ßok daha y√ºksek bir √∂neme sahip olduƒüu g√ºn√ºm√ºz i≈ü d√ºnyasƒ±nda , efektif bir lider inovatif teknolojileri insanlara -hem √ßalƒ±≈üanlar hem m√º≈üteriler hem de i≈ü ortaklarƒ± ve payda≈ülar- hizmet ettirmeyi ba≈üarabilmelidir.
161.title: Dijital √áaƒüda Liderlik

162.description: In our daily lives, we often face different scale of problems and may not be solving them efficiently or may not be solving them at all, can we can change this around and create more practical, faster and sustainable solutions, by design? What makes an app easy to use, a poster starring, a pair of pants comfortable or a building available for us, the end user, is the design process behind them. As design touches every aspect of our lives, why not use its thinking methods for improving our personal lives as well as professions?
162.title: Keep Calm Start Design Thinking

163.description: Bu oturumda test m√ºhendisliƒüine giri≈ü ve sonrasƒ±nda ya≈üanan problemlere  nasƒ±l √ß√∂z√ºm √ºretebiliriz, doƒüan ihtiya√ßlarƒ± nasƒ±l kar≈üƒ±larƒ±z, test otomasyonu ne zaman gereklidir/ne kadar gereklidir, mobil test otomasyonuna en hƒ±zlƒ± giri≈üi nasƒ±l yapabiliriz ve sonrasƒ±nda kullandƒ±ƒüƒ±mƒ±z teknolojinin deƒüi≈ümesi gerekiyor mu kararƒ±nƒ± nasƒ±l veririz, bize en uygun teknolojiyi nasƒ±l buluruz ve nasƒ±l teknoloji deƒüi≈ütiririz konularƒ±ndan bahsedeceƒüim. Spesifik olarak android test automation ve toollarƒ± hakkƒ±nda bilgilendirme yapacaƒüƒ±m.

164.description: Yapay Zekanin hayattan ve farkli endustrilerden ornekleriyle ne oldugunu, ve bu konuda calismak icin neler ‚Äògerektigini‚Äô konusacagiz. Everday examples of AI, basics. How to pursue a career in AI as a woman tech maker
164.title: Yapay Zeka ve Uygulamalari ( AI and its applications)

165.description: Dijital Yƒ±kƒ±m(Digital Distruption) artƒ±k b√ºy√ºk, k√º√ß√ºk b√ºt√ºn kurumlarƒ± hatta end√ºstrileri etkiliyor. Teknoloji ve inovasyonun hƒ±zlanmasƒ± ile birlikte kullanƒ±cƒ± davranƒ±≈ülarƒ± ve kullanƒ±cƒ±larƒ±n markalara bakƒ±≈ülarƒ± deƒüi≈üti. Google anƒ±nda her sorumuza cevap veriyor, sosyal medya real time g√ºncellemeleri ile ‚Äúalways ‚Äìon‚Äù k√ºlt√ºr√ºn√º yarattƒ± ve artƒ±k herkes 7/24 hizmet bekler hale geldi. Profesyonelle≈ümi≈ü ve varsayƒ±lanƒ±n √ºzerinde hizmet bekleyen m√º≈üteriyi elde tutmak g√º√ßle≈üti. Artƒ±k s√ºrd√ºr√ºlebilir ba≈üarƒ± ve hatta hayatta kalmak i√ßin dijitalle≈üme ve b√ºt√ºn i≈ü alanlarƒ±nda √ßevik y√∂netim bakƒ±≈ü a√ßƒ±sƒ± ≈üart(agile mindset). Kƒ±sacasƒ± m√º≈üteri deneyimini m√ºkemmelle≈ütirmek i√ßin sadece yazƒ±lƒ±m alanƒ±nda deƒüil, kurumun her yerinde hƒ±zlƒ± karar alma ve uygulamak gerekli. ≈ûirket b√ºy√ºmesinde istikrar, g√ºvenilirlik, √ßeviklik ve hƒ±z istiyorsak kurum i√ßinde deƒüi≈üim ajanlarƒ±na ve √ßevik liderlere ihtiyacƒ±mƒ±z var.
165.title: Agile Leadership

168.description: Merak, soru sormak ve bilim! peki ya bilim insanƒ± deƒüilsek bize neden bilim lazƒ±m? Bu sorularla bilim hakkƒ±nda daha fazla soru sormamƒ±z i√ßin bu konu≈ümayƒ± hazƒ±rladƒ±m. Evet konu≈ümanƒ±n amacƒ± cevaplar vermekten √ßok daha fazla d√º≈ü√ºnmek ve sormak. √á√ºnk√º her≈üey bir soru sorarak ba≈ülar.Merak, insanlƒ±ƒüƒ±n en temel ya≈üamsal √∂zelliklerinden biridir. √ñzellikle √ßocukluk √ßaƒüƒ±nda √∂nplandadƒ±r. Yeti≈ükinlikteyse daha se√ßici ve sofistike bir hal alarak hayatƒ±mƒ±za dahil olur. √áocuklar g√∂ky√ºz√º neden mavi diye merak ederken, yeti≈ükinler u√ßaklardan neden gaz bulutu √ßƒ±ktƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ± merak ederler. Merak etme s√ºreci soru sormayƒ± da beraberinde getirir. Etraflarƒ±ndaki ≈üeylere g√∂re, neden, nasƒ±l, nerede, kim, ne sorularƒ± ilk akla gelenlerdir. Bilim, insanlƒ±ƒüƒ±n evreni anlama √ßabasƒ±nda g√ºn√ºm√ºzde kullandƒ±ƒüƒ± en sistematik yakla≈üƒ±mdƒ±r. Belli bir disiplin ve √ßalƒ±≈üma y√∂ntemiyle etrafƒ±mƒ±zƒ± ke≈üfetmemizin ismidir de diyebiliriz. Bilim soru sorarak ara≈ütƒ±rmaya ba≈ülar. Sorularƒ±na ise belli bir d√ºzen i√ßinde yapƒ±lmƒ±≈ü ara≈ütƒ±rmalarla cevap vermeye √ßalƒ±≈üƒ±r. Ancak her yeni cevap, kendisiyle birlikte yeni ba≈üka sorular getirir. Bu s√ºre√ßlerin tamamƒ±na bilim deriz.Peki neden bilim herkese lazƒ±m? Soru sormak ve etrafƒ± ke≈üfetmek en temel i√ßg√ºd√ºlerimizden biri. Bu ke≈üif s√ºreciniyse ≈üu anda en iyi ortaya koyu≈ü y√∂ntemlerimizden biri de bilim.
168.title: Bilim Herkese Lazƒ±m!

169.description: If you are into mobile development, you probably heard of Flutter. It's the new kid in the block and offers you a native cross-platform development environment. Even before the stable version, big companies like Alibaba decided to move their applications to Flutter. After it became stable, it got even more attention.One of the mottos of the Flutter was 'Developing beautiful applications in record time'. As we all know, for building a beautiful application, we need to understand the theming and how it works in platforms. In this talk we are going to talk about the base concepts of theming, how you can implement theming in Flutter by following the Material Guidelines and see how we can create a beautiful application.
169.title: Mastering the Theming in Flutter

170.title: ƒ∞ngilizce Ama Ne? ƒ∞ngilizce Ama Ne kadar?

PinarUgurluKirazci.bio: Pinar was born in June 14, 1981 in Ankara, Turkey. She had her bachelor degree in Bilkent University Computer Engineering Department in 2002 and Masters of Business Administration from Bogazici University in 2006.Pinar started her career in IBM Turkey in September 2002 as a Developer Consultant then switched to Technical Presales and Software Architect roles. Pinar acts as a trusted advisor and dedicated client architect for strategic enterprise customers. Then joined HPE Software in December 2014 as a Software Business Consultant to develop the business in enterprise customers. Pinar has been part of enterprise scale digital transformation, application lifecycle management and devops related projects.After 15 years of broad IT experience; she joined Google as a Cloud Customer Engineer in August 2017. This proves that she has the passion for technical engineering roles and passion to learn. She is now taking active role in Cloud adoption and have special interest in serverless technologies.
